pkgmetadata.longdescription: # stpipe[![CI](https://github.com/spacetelescope/stpipe/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/spacetelescope/stpipe/actions/workflows/ci.yml)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/spacetelescope/stpipe/branch/master/graph/badge.svg?token=Mm9I0X1o4X)](https://codecov.io/gh/spacetelescope/stpipe)Provides base classes and command-line tools for implementing calibration pipeline software.
